name: The Descender .2
description:
The Descender .2 is the expansion upon the first demo, now with a larger map, more enemies and ambiance ~ OoOoo spooky

I'm working on making this a larger game with more enemies and unique NPC's you can interact with, but for now I'm adding a bit more of an arcade feel with music from Bensley - by Vex, a Monstercat artist because ofcourse they're always all such amazing artists. Since this is lowkey and incomplete I just wanted to add a good jam ontop of everything so that there's something other than silence lol
